name: The Last Adventure of Det. Sheldon Bones
name_original: The Last Adventure of Det. Sheldon Bones
description:
Soundtrack consists of four songs, all of them being remixes of the tone poem Danse macabre, Op. 40, written in 1874 by Camille Saint-Saëns.

1. Bukimina！ Saigo no odori (duration 08:14)

played in the Main menu.

2. Smooth Rituel (duration 11:38)

Played in the post-tutorial levels.

3. Bukimina no teco (duration 02:30)

Played in the tutorial level.

4. dansu dansu！ Shindemo iiwa (duration 06:33)

Played during the last level.

💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀💀
